text.tspan: Climbing the pyramid grants more and more rights
Build your schedule, delete your slots
Build schedules and delete slots for you and people under your direct supervision
upgrade the slots confirmation level to 2.
Build schedules and delete slots for you and people from the whole team
upgrade the slots confirmation level to 3, edit users.
Check and confirm the whole schedule
Do the dirty work (edit rooms, add maps, users, rooms)
